item.title: Unveiling the Three Dimensions of "Resolution"
item.description: Introduction The word “resolution” is a linguistic chameleon, effortlessly donning multiple meanings across various contexts. Far from a monolithic concept, “resolution” reveals itself as a versatile term with three distinct facets that encapsulate its diverse applications. 1. Problem-Solving Prowess In its first guise, “resolution” serves as a beacon in the realm of conflict and challenges. Here, it embodies the art and science of finding solutions to problems. Whether navigating a dispute, addressing a complex issue, or unraveling a conundrum, resolution emerges as the guiding force that leads to clarity and harmony.

item.title: Daily English Discoveries and Practical Uses
item.description: sanity Let’s perform a simple sanity check and compute the performance of the model using Root Squared Mean Error (RSME) metric. (mentally healthy) paramount As models grow in complexity, interpretability becomes paramount. (very important) drawback Too much uniformity can also be a drawback. (disadvantage) alleviate In this work, we propose mixup, a simple learning principle to alleviate these issues. (make less severe) maul help which side you’d mauled either way (physical attack)
